definition: variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Your willingness to sacrifice countless late nights consoling them?
sentences.chinese: 或者是因为你愿意花费无数的夜晚去安慰他们？

sentences.english: Yeah, like gentle breeze blowing through the cheeks, the hair dancing in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 是的，像微风吹过面颊，因为发梢在跳舞。

sentences.english: The reason Burundi is so poor is because they have never really had any peaceful time between the everlasting civil wars.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家贫穷的真正原因是因为连绵不绝的内战。

sentences.english: but he left it to him on such terms as destroyed half the value of the bequest .
sentences.chinese: 但是，因为附有条件，这份遗产便失去了一半价值。

sentences.english: It turns out that you can be a committed nurse and have a social life.
sentences.chinese: 因为那可以证明你可以是个有社交生活的带罪护士。

sentences.english: So watch out for these tests because they happen all the time。
sentences.chinese: 所以，要当心这些测试，因为它们无时不在。

sentences.english: It was in this context that international support and scrutiny were critical.
sentences.chinese: 正因为是在这种情况下，国际援助和监督才很重要。

sentences.english: Because our triune God is the God of all grace.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们的三位一体神是充满恩典的神。

sentences.english: It's much cheaper to anticipate rather than respond.
sentences.chinese: 因为预先做出反应远比事后补救便宜的多。

sentences.english: Bill didn't go to college, now that he was apprenticed to a carpenter.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔没有去上大学，因为他学徒做了木匠。

sentences.english: Because we cannot feel the sweet without comparison.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们无法感觉到甜而不比较。

sentences.english: I hope I don't need it, because I don't even know how to load it.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我并不需要它，因为我还不知道怎么装子弹呢。

sentences.english: He's a good lecturer as he really knows his stuff.
sentences.chinese: 他是位好讲师，因为他确实精通业务。
因为生活本来就是一往直前的。

sentences.english: You're mad because he lied to you.
sentences.chinese: 你因为他对你撒了个谎就气得不顾一切了。

sentences.english: Have you remained silent in an English conversation because you were afraid of saying something wrong?
sentences.chinese: 你是否因为担心自己会讲错英文而在交流时保持沉默？

definition: and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
due to/as a result of/thanks to/owing to/since/because
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
original/originally/at first/it goes without saying/of course
